subject: docs: update notification references from header to Settings modal
body:
Notification controls were moved to the Settings modal but several
references in CLAUDE.md and NotificationBanner.tsx still pointed to
"home screen header". Updated to reflect the current flow.

https://claude.ai/code/session_018NrJiMtPGf7KmYUgKG9yCq
title: update notification references from header to Settings modal
